mapper.insert: INSERT INTO season(season_name, season_topic_desc, season_begin_time, season_end_time, season_status, season_athlete_amount, create_time, edit_time) VALUES (#{seasonName}, #{seasonTopicDesc}, #{seasonBeginTime}, #{seasonEndTime}, #{seasonStatus}, #{seasonAthleteAmount}, #{createTime}, #{editTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE season
season_status=#{season.seasonStatus}, season_name=#{season.seasonName}, season_topic_desc=#{season.seasonTopicDesc}, season_begin_time=#{season.seasonBeginTime}, season_end_time=#{season.seasonEndTime}, season_status=#{season.seasonStatus},
season_athlete_amount=#{season.seasonAthleteAmount},
create_time=#{season.createTime}, edit_time=#{season.editTime},
WHERE season_id=#{season.seasonId}
